page.title: 15ARMED ROBBERY
page.content: An{armed robbery}took place outside Balfour's newsagent and sub-post office in Fleming Crescent, Sele Farm Estate, Hertford on May 14th. Two gunmen, with a sawn-off shotgun and a handgun, held up two Post Office employers and seized{Â£10000}in cash after they stopped their vehicle outside Balfour's at 11.10am. The gunmen were joined by a third robber who then raced to a stolen getaway car, a red Ford Sierra estate which was waiting in Tudor Way, with a fourth man at the wheel. The snatch lasted only a few seconds and the two Post Office employees were unable to use their hand held alarms. Police have already received descriptions of the four men seen by witnesses.
